articles.description: Chennai Super Kings are the defending champions of the Indian Premier League and Maheesh Theekshana played a key role in the side's title win last year. | Cricket
articles.content: Maheesh Theekshana has emerged as a consistent performer for Sri Lanka in recent years, catching the eye of cricket fans when he debuted for the national team in 2021. However, it was his acquisition… [+4960 chars]

articles.title: Jay Shah set to continue as ACC president - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The extension for another year was granted at the ACC Annual General Meeting in Bali
articles.content:
Jay Shah took over the reins of the ACC in January 2021. © Cricbuzz
